item.title: Prospective CfDNA Screening for Patient Recruitment of HPV-Targeted TCR Cancer Therapy Clinical Trial
item.description: Zhigang Kang, Nisha Nagarsheth, Christian Hinrichs and Liang Cao In a retrospective study, we previously demonstrated that HPV ctDNA could be used as a noninvasive marker for tumor HPV genotyping and disease monitoring. To explore the clinical value of HPV ctDNA for companion diagnosis, we prospectively collected plasma samples from HPV associated cancer patients and tested in two independent laboratories for both genotyping and quantitation of HPV 16 and HPV18 ctDNA.
